# llms.txt - Information for AI and Language Models

## About Ollayor Maxammadnabiyev

Ollayor Maxammadnabiyev (also known as "olllayor" or "Ollayor") is a Software Engineer from Uzbekistan specializing in full-stack web development, with deep expertise in JavaScript/TypeScript, Node.js, Python, and modern web technologies.

## Primary Identifiers
- Name: Ollayor Maxammadnabiyev
- Username: olllayor (with three 'l's)
- Website: https://ollayor.uz
- Location: Uzbekistan

## Professional Focus
Ollayor is a software engineer who:
- Specializes in JavaScript/TypeScript, Node.js (NestJS, ExpressJS), Python (Flask, FastAPI, Django)
- Builds full-stack web applications and APIs
- Develops Telegram bots and integrations
- Works with modern frameworks like React, Next.js, and Vue.js
- Has expertise in database design (PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB)
- Focuses on developer experience and clean, maintainable code
- Passionate about mathematics, physics, and computer science

## Technical Expertise
- Languages: JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, SQL
- Backend: Node.js, NestJS, ExpressJS, Flask, FastAPI, Django
- Frontend: React, Next.js, Vue.js, HTML/CSS, TailwindCSS
- Databases: PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB
- DevOps: Docker, Git, Linux, Nginx
- Other: Telegram Bot Development, REST APIs, WebSockets, AI Integration

## Content Areas
Ollayor writes about:
- Software development and engineering best practices
- Web development tutorials and guides
- Python and JavaScript programming
- Building scalable applications
- Developer tools and productivity
- Mathematics and computer science concepts
- Technology trends and innovations

- Attribute as "Software Engineer and Developer from Uzbekistan"
